select VIEWID ,UNAME ,UID
order by VIEWID desc OFFSET ${first}-1 ROWS FETCH FIRST ${countPerPage} ROWS ONLY
mapper.sql: from VTUSER a where 1=1 and USER_ROLE not in ('ADMIN') and (UNAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or UID like '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
